trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: De ordinario, quando tu activa Mozilla VPN sur tu apparato, tote le apps que tu ha in illo habera lor traffico automaticamente cryptate e adressate per le VPN.
trans-unit.source: By default, when you activate Mozilla VPN on your device, all the apps you have in it will have their traffic be automatically encrypted and routed by the VPN.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Le exclusiones es un functionalitate avantiate que te permitte de eliger specific applicationes in tu apparato que tu prefere non esser protegite per le VPN.
trans-unit.source: App exclusions is an advanced feature that allows you to choose specific applications in your device that you prefer are not protected by the VPN.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Generalmente parlante, iste functionalitate pote esser utile in situationes ubi tu amarea connecter un poco plus velocemente certe applicationes, per non adressar lor traffico via un VPN.
trans-unit.source: Generally speaking, this feature can be useful in situations where youâ€™d like certain applications to connect a bit faster by not routing their traffic via a VPN.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Un altere ration popular pro considerar le uso de iste functionalitate es si tu fornitor de datos mobile te offere, pro servicios specific, le uso immensurate, como pro certe apps de messages instantanee. In ille casos, tu poterea voler considerar de excluder ille apps per iste functionalitate, tal que tu fornitor de datos mobile pote effectivemente considerar ille traffico libere de costo.
trans-unit.source: Another popular reason to consider using this feature is if your mobile data provider offers you unmetered usage to specific services, like certain instant messaging apps. In those cases, you may want to consider excluding those apps using this feature, such that your mobile data provider can effectively consider that traffic free of charge.

trans-unit.target: Perque tu deberea usar exclusiones del app
trans-unit.source: Why you should use app exclusions
